entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 7:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: ESE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
